title: Dark Ambience SFX: Deathscape
description: 19 good dark ambience SFX for your dark games.
longDescription:
The dark ambiences created through the stages of Sound Design are highly suitable for industrial, cyber, futuristic, sci-fi, or horror games. Focused solely on evoking dark emotions, these products consist of seamless loop-capable drones, each with specified tempo (BPM) information. They progress over a sufficient duration before seamlessly looping at a certain point.


Please watch our short PREVIEW VIDEO showcasing all the tracks.


Dark Ambience SFX: Deathscape has been updated for free for itâ€™s users, we thank you:

  • The theme of the update is aliens.
  • 5 new "Base Drones" have been added. These ambiance products are presented as both full and loop versions.
  • 4 SFX Layers (full and loop) have been added. Composed atonally to work alongside the Base Drones, these sounds can be layered or stacked with the Base Drones, or used separately.
  • If you enjoy managing an ambiance file piece by piece, in layers, then this is also suitable for you. We have tried to facilitate ease of use by ensuring that the tempo and lengths of each newly added song are equal.
  • The total number of files added is 18, with 9 being unique. The product's total unique count has increased from 10 to 19.
  • We will continue to update this product.

DETAILS

  • Unique SFX Count: 19
  • Cue Count: 28
  • Duration: 1 hour
  • Looping: Yes
  • Mastered: Yes
  • Loudness Method: Easy-listening
  • Sample Rate: 44100
  • Output: 24 bit WAV
  • Size: 1.07 GB (uncompressed)
  • Royalty-Free: Yes
  • Progressive Pack: Yes, this pack will have free future updates
technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
